quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
Even when you'd lost everything you thought there was to lose, somebody came along and gave you something for free.
By trying to understand everything, everything makes me dream.
Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
The old believe everything, the middle-aged suspect everything, the young know everything.
Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
Try to learn something about everything and everything about something.
High expectations are the key to everything.
Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content.
Question everything. Learn something. Answer nothing.
Everything that can be counted does not necessarily count; everything that counts cannot necessarily be counted.
I don't wish to be everything to everyone, but I would like to be something to someone.
Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.
Everything you can imagine is real.
To understand everything is to forgive everything.
Everything changes, nothing remains without change.
To receive everything, one must open one's hands and give.
Everything starts with one step, or one brick, or one word or one day.
I think that everything happens for a reason, everything happens when it's going to happen.
Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time.
Everything happens for a reason and a purpose, and it serves you.
Everything happens for a reason, but that doesn't mean there's a point.
I trust that everything happens for a reason, even when we're not wise enough to see it.
Those people who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
We cannot do everything at once, but we can do something at once.
There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under heaven.
Everything is temporary. Everything is bound to end.
Everything in this life has a purpose, there are no mistakes, no coincidences.
